meanings.definition: To commit a robbery or theft.
meanings.sent1: The thief was heisting money from the bank.
meanings.sent2: Criminals were heisting valuable items from the store.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky raccoon was heisting snacks from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: She was heisting glances at her crush during class.
meanings.sent5: The pirate captain was heisting treasure from the enemy ship.

meanings.definition: The act of stealing or robbing.
meanings.sent1: The heisting of jewels was a daring crime.
meanings.sent2: The police were investigating a series of heistings in the city.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's heisting of nuts amused the park visitors.
meanings.sent4: The heisting of hearts at the dance made him popular.
meanings.sent5: The heisting of secrets led to a thrilling plot twist in the movie.
